product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.time_representativeness: 2017 calendar year production data, 2020 mix data
databases_and_lca_software_used: Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI) (2017)
World Business Council for Sustainable Development (WBCSD) Cement Sustainability Initiative (CSI) Tool Project Database (2018)
lca_information.allocation: Proportion inputs and outputs to intermediate flows at the quarry and processes at the batching plant level
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: No flows were excluded on the basis of cut-off criteria

scenarios: Disposal of concrete at a landfill site
Reuse of recovered concrete elements in new construction works
Use of concrete debris, e.g. in land restoration

carbon_emission_context.lifetime_absorption_of_co2: Carbonation is a natural process whereby concrete absorbs carbon dioxide (CO2) from the atmosphere

recycled_materials_handling.allocation_approach: AusLCI LCA database was used as a default for secondary data and processes

Australasian EPD Programme. (2018). Guidance on the use of background LCI data.
